definition: Silvester refers to the last day of the year, commonly celebrated with festivities and gatherings. It is often associated with fireworks, parties, and the countdown to midnight.

examples.german: Silvester ist der letzte Tag des Jahres.
examples.english: New Year's Eve is the last day of the year.

examples.german: Wir feiern Silvester mit Freunden und Familie.
examples.english: We celebrate New Year's Eve with friends and family.

examples.german: In Deutschland ist Silvester ein Feiertag.
examples.english: In Germany, New Year's Eve is a public holiday.

examples.german: Silvester wird oft mit Feuerwerk gefeiert.
examples.english: New Year's Eve is often celebrated with fireworks.
New Year's Eve parties are very popular.
